thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
So we have a Citroën which needed a new tyres as mine had a puncture. The car was due its mot the same day. However we couldn't find the locking wheel nut. We rang the number to be told "we'll sort it " the guy who came turned up 2 hours early which was great. He spent about 2 minutes trying to get the locking wheel nuts off. He told me he couldn't do it but we still got charged £25 call out fee. Not bad for 2 minutes work!
We have since taken it to a garage who got all 4 locking nuts off, fit a new tyre and replaced the locking nuts all for £60.
My business will be going elsewhere in the future.
